title: Scott Bolton (American football)
text:
Scott Allen Bolton (born January 4, 1965) is a former <a href="wide%20receiver">wide receiver</a> in the <a href="National%20Football%20League">National Football League</a>.
Biography.
Bolton was born Scott Allen Bolton on January 4, 1965 in <a href="Mobile%2C%20Alabama">Mobile, Alabama</a>.
Career.
Bolton was drafted by the <a href="Green%20Bay%20Packers">Green Bay Packers</a> in the twelfth round of the <a href="1988%20NFL%20Draft">1988 NFL Draft</a> and played that season with the team. He played at the collegiate level at <a href="Auburn%20University">Auburn University</a>.
